get.summary: gets a specific html transformed via a specified xslt
get.description: By passing the appropriate xml-ID and xslt you can retrieve ready to display html

parameters.name: xslt
parameters.description: the filename of the xslt transformation

html.value:
Sample Texts (Explanation)

 {teiLink}

The sample texts are translations of the same source text. They vary slightly with respect to regional differences. However, they are homogeneous enough to allow students to compare the numerous linguistic phenomena displayed in the texts.

Sofar we provide sample texts for six locations:

  • Baghdad
  • Cairo
  • Damascus
  • Douz
  • Ôö╝├ùanlÔöÇÔûÆurfa
  • Tunis

html.value:
Skoura

 {teiLink}
Courtesy of Stephan ProchÔö£├¡zka, 2012
MSA Name ├ÅÔöéÔöÿ├óÔöÿ├¬├ÅÔûÆ├Å┬«
MSA Name (trans.) SakÔö╝┬¢ra SkÔö╝┬¢ra
Geo location 31Ôö¼Ôûæ03'N 06Ôö¼Ôûæ33'W Morocco
Contributed by Aleksandra ErcegovÔöÇ├¼eviÔöÇ├º
Typology
West (Maghreb) ├ö├çÔòæ Morocco ├ö├çÔòæ Central type
Hilalian-type sedentary rural dialect with strong influence of Berber
General
SkÔö╝┬¢ra is an Arabic enclave in the Berber-speaking area south of the High Atlas. Many of the 15,000 inhabitants are bilingual. They live mainly on agriculture and stock breeding.
Research History
All available data on the dialect of SkÔö╝┬¢ra is from the work of Jorge AguadÔö£┬« and Mohammad ElyaÔö£├│coubi. AguadÔö£┬« 1994 is a brief study on the formation of the reflexive-passive forms of the verb. AguadÔö£┬« and Elyaacoubi 1995 is a monograph on the dialect with chapters on phonology, nominal and verbal morphology, and verb paradigms. AguadÔö£┬« et al. 1996 deals with the irrigation system in the oasis of SkÔö╝┬¢ra, and the technical terminology concerning irrigation in the dialect of SkÔö╝┬¢ra. ElyaÔö£├│coubi 1998 treats the topic of the classification of south Moroccan Arabic dialects on the example of SkÔö╝┬¢ra, where a three page-grammatical sketch of the dialect is also provided.
Dictionaries
AguadÔö£┬« et al. 1996 includes a 2-page glossary of terminology related to the irrigation system (xi├ƒÔòú┬í├ƒÔòú┬íÔöÇ├╝ra).
Bibliography
To view publications on this variety click here.
